title: domulys
author: domulys
created_time: January 06, 2023, 10:38:10 PMLast edit: January 08, 2023, 01:51:44 AM by domulys
content: I'm surprised he hasn't posted this himself, but FractalEncrypt -- the maker of Michael Saylor's Full Node Sculpture and the Bitcoin Infinity Keys -- has a new project:    https://timechainartifacts.com/It's a limited edition of 210 hardcover copies of his "Timechain Codex" (a futuristic & illustrated Bitcoin comic).Check it out!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Nice catch! FractalEncrypts wooden Full Node sculpture is definetly an insane piece of art.If the comic were available for less than a quater of its current pricing I'd consider getting one - it does look cool. 0.021 for an edition of 210 just seems off, though. That being said, there only seems to be one left in stock. hmm

FractalEncrypts wooden Full Node sculpture is definetly an insane piece of art.If the comic were available for less than a quater of its current pricing I'd consider getting one - it does look cool. 0.021 for an edition of 210 just seems off, though. That being said, there only seems to be one left in stock. hmm.0021 for an edition of 210. !!sats vary.edition 1-20  price   ₿ 0.021edition  21-39 price ₿ 0.019 list continue.  agree with ya . comic book would b aweso

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: The fancy covers are insane but 1 BTC? That's a pretty penny

comments.author: Honeybadger2014
comments.body: I love fractal’s work, but i agree he does have a tendency to price on the high side.  Especially during a bear market!
